mcq.statement: Change the voice: She says, “I keep at an arm’s length, all those who try to flatter me.”

options.a: She said that she kept at an arms length all those who try to flatter her.
options.b: She says that she keeps at an arm’s length all those who try to flatter her.
options.c: She exclaims that she keeps at an arm’s length all of them who try to flatter her.
